pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or Mac OS X 10.9.2 or later
  • Processor: Dual-core Intel or AMD processor, 1.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated Graphics or higher
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit or Mac OS X 10.9.2 or later
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
